name: Spectral Sickle
passive: Tribute: Damaging an enemy champion by attack or ability grants 20 gold and heals your most wounded nearby ally (10 second cooldown per target). Killing a minion charges this item.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Health, Ability Power. Passive effect: Damaging an enemy champion by attack or ability grants 20 gold and heals your most wounded nearby ally (10 second cooldown per target). Killing a minion charges this item.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy mixed damage compositions
The resistances help you survive longer in team fights
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
